title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-1.2 - Administration fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-1.2 - Administration fund

State Regulations

Beginning with the date of substantial completion, all
project revenue shall be deposited into the administration fund and all expense
chargeable to project revenues shall be paid therefrom. The opening of the
administration fund at the beginning of the initial operating period, the
operation of the fund during that period, the setting up of the income and
expense analysis ledgers and the tenants' accounting system, the closing of the
books at the end of the initial operating period, the transfer of funds between
the development and administration funds to adjust for net income or deficit of
the initial operating period, advances by the development fund, prepaid
expenses and payable, change and petty cash funds, etc., have been described in

Subpart 1646-6, to which references should be made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
